document_data.name: Edythe Brightsworn
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Edythe Brightsworn''' was a knight of [[Lathander]] that proved her devotion to the Morninglord during the latter half of the 13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: She was a devout [[paladin]] of Lathander who accumulated a fair amount of wealth that she used to carry out a holy quest in her god's name.
document_data.Possessions: Lady Brightsworn commissioned the ''[[Circlet of the Cynosure]]'', a magical headband that offered her protection from [[charm]] magic and debilitating fear.
